entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
